column1: text

Ladies did you ever miss someone who didn’t deserve it at all, maybe they cheated, lied, stole. . And yet inside you couldn’t get them out of your heart or mind, how do you deal and move past those feelings?

What's your 'I'm so stupid' moment of this week?


I locked myself out of my car today. Also broke into my first car today. I now know how to break into vehicles.

What's the best part of living alone?


For me, my shower wall hair art get to live its best life for a few days until I wash my hair again.
